ANNOUNCEMENTS
MBO PARTNERS ANNOUNCES KEY CHANGES TO TECHNOLOGY LEADERSHIP TEAM We're excited to announce exciting new changes in the Technology department here at MBO Partners! MBO Technology Veteran David North has assumed the newly-created position of Chief Information Officer. MBO has appointed Jonathan Lochhaas as the new Chief Technology Officer. more > (http://www.mbopartners.com/news-events/mbo-partners-announces-key-changes-and-additions-technology-leadership-team#)
LANDMARK NATIONAL STUDY REVEALS MILLIONS JOIN A NEW AGE OF CAREER INDEPENDENCE MBO Partners' State of Independence in America Study shows 28 million Americans are considering becoming Independent within the next two years. Learn more about this landmark study that examines the state of independent work in America, as well as the motivated pioneers leading the charge. more > (http://www.mbopartners.com/news-events/landmark-national-study-reveals-millions-join-new-age-career-independence-surprising-pic#)
IN THE NEWS
MILLENNIALS SPUR INDEPENDENT JOB REVOLUTION Millennials are driving the project economy, opting for freelance or consulting work in lieu of traditional full-time employment. But the lure of picking and choosing their clients comes with risk. more > (http://www.portfolio.com/resources/2011/09/26/millennials-spur-independent-job-revolution#)
FOR AMERICAN WORKERS, IT'S THE AGE OF INDEPENDENCE The independent labor market is today the fastest-growing segment of the American workforce, currently 16 million strong, and according to the study, projected to grow to 21 million over the next few years. Of the 16 million, 70% or 10 million are independent experts – those offering specialized knowledge and skills to the open market. more > (http://www.forbes.com/sites/ciocentral/2011/09/23/for-american-workers-its-the-age-of-independence/#)
